author: mac_l
content: What is the message about log compression you are seeing? We are going through some changes to our logging and still ironing out some issues

author: jgm
content:
```
Couldn't compress log file: File IO error: No such file or directory (os error 2)
```

My startup includes `--logfile-max-size 0` so would I expect the logging to be disabled.

author: calvix.
content:
I see the same error on lighthouse docker image tag `v7.0.0-beta.3`
```
{"msg":"Unable to check genesis execution payload","level":"ERRO","ts":"2025-03-16T07:16:26.213356293Z","service":"slot_notifier","error":"ExecutionLayerGetBlockByNumberFailed(EngineError(Api { error: Json(Error(\"missing field `totalDifficulty`\", line: 0, column: 0)) }))"}
```
is there a docker iamge that i can use which fixes this error?

author: parithosh
content: This is an ignorable error for now, the EL (you likely use geth?) doesn't repsond with that field anymore

author: calvix.
content: Ok great, than that's good.  (and yes it is geth)

author: odracri.
content: <@199561711278227457> would be the genesis be updated from [this issue](https://github.com/eth-clients/hoodi/issues/2#issuecomment-2728880908) or should we do a PR directly? thanks

author: barnabasbusa
content: The genesis file has been created, and no more changes will be done on them.

author: barnabasbusa
content: thats why we had a deadline for responding to the issue mentioned above at `Deadline for responding to the issue is 2PM UTC, 14th March.`

author: barnabasbusa
content: But we are going to have a faucet/fundingvault that will give out the eth post genesis .

author: odracri.
content: ok, thank you. we were originally requesting 1M eth to run those validators on our side, but would that amount be possible throught he faucet/fundingvault?

author: jgm
content: hoodi has justified epoch 2, looks like we're on our way.

author: jgm
content: People shouldn't need it at the moment, but if you want to test out CL checkpoint sync then https://hoodi-checkpoint-sync.attestant.io/ is up and running.

author: parithosh
content: could you add it here too? https://github.com/eth-clients/checkpoint-sync-endpoints/

author: chay_z123
content: For spinning up Hoodi nodes, what are the recommended versions for Geth / Prysm pair?

author: barnabasbusa
content: client teams are still preparing a release. For now you would need to run it as a custom network, but by end of the week we should have some clients making releases.
